comments: /** Gets the format from given name.
@param  name            The string of format name

@param  accessibleOnly  If true,
 non-accessible format will treat as invalid format,

otherwise,
 all supported format are valid.
@param  caseSensitive   Should be set true if string match should use case sensitivity.

@return                The format match the format name,
 or PF_UNKNOWN if is invalid name.
